titleStmt.title: A declaration of divers gentlemen of VVales concerning Collonell Poyer: and his proceedings in this and the former engagement. His actions stated. And a declaration sealed by collonel Poyer for the King against the parliament. VVith the whole case delivered upon oath, upon the examination of severall witnesses. April 19. 1648 Imprimatur G.M.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H. Becke, and are to be sold in the Old Bayley,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
